statements: DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 AND stock_quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM products WHERE id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE quantity < 5);
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 101 AND product_name = 'Shirt';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 201 OR supplier_contact = '1234567890';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 OR stock_level > 100;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 2002 AND stock_level < 10;
